url.description: The url where the mod is stored.

summary.description: Replaces the description in the mod list.

description.description: A description of the mod. You should add a summary if this variable gets too big.

LT_version.description: Version of LT it was last tested on, or built from in the case of a custom build.

cover.description: The image displayed in the mod list. Please use URL's for images, not data blobs.

dependencies.title: Dependencies
dependencies.description: Modules required for your mod to function properly.

images.description: A widget that shows additional images near the top of the mod page.

tags.description: A list of words that can be used to find the mod when filtering on them.
